item.title: Al Gore on the Obstacles to Solving the Climate Crisis
item.description: In his TED talk, former US Vice President Al Gore discusses the obstacles to solving the climate crisis and speeding up solutions. He focuses on two main obstacles - the unrelenting opposition from the fossil fuel industry and the global financial system and subsidies for fossil fuels.
